company.name: InPlace Creates
company.description: Welcome to our world of endless imagination and boundless creativity. Together, let's embark on a remarkable journey where dreams become tangible realities.

services.title:
Branding &
Identity Design
services.description: We don't just design logos — we build brand worlds. From visual identity to voice, we help businesses craft a brand that feels human, bold, and instantly recognizable. Whether you're starting from scratch or evolving your look, we turn your values into visuals that stick.
services.bannerSubtitle: Building brand worlds that feel human, bold, and instantly recognizable.

approach.title: Our Approach and Work Specifics
description: At InPlace Creates, we don't just design logos, we help you build a brand that's memorable, meaningful, and built to grow.

Our approach blends creativity, strategic thinking, and visual clarity. We dig deep to understand your story, values, and target audience, then translate all of that into a cohesive visual identity that makes you stand out.

includes.title: Core Elements We Offer
items: Add-ons: packaging, launch kits, social media starter kits, templates

accordions.title: Logo Design
accordions.content: We craft timeless and versatile logos tailored to your brand's personality and tone. Whether it's an icon, wordmark, or custom lettering, your logo becomes the anchor of your identity.

accordions.title: Visual Identity Systems
accordions.content: Beyond the logo, we create full visual ecosystems: typography, color palettes, iconography, textures, and grids, all aligned to keep your brand consistent and flexible across media.

accordions.title: Brand Guidelines
accordions.content: We provide professionally designed brand manuals that serve as a go-to reference for your team, partners, and collaborators, ensuring everyone uses your brand assets consistently and correctly.

accordions.title: Strategy & Discovery
accordions.content: Every strong identity starts with clarity. We run collaborative sessions to define your brand personality, tone of voice, and visual direction before we ever open a design tool.

accordions.title: Add-On Services
accordions.content: Looking to go beyond the core identity? We also offer: Packaging design, Brand launch content (posters, rollouts), Social media starter kits, Presentation templates, Branded merchandise concepts

services.title:
Campaigns &
Storytelling
services.description: We turn creative direction into campaigns that move people. From concept to final execution, we craft stories designed for social feeds, billboards, and everywhere in between. Great ideas, powerful visuals, and real impact.
services.bannerSubtitle: Crafting stories and campaigns that move people across all platforms and touchpoints.

approach.title: Our Approach and Work Specifics
description: At InPlace Creates, we build campaigns that don't just catch eyes, they tell stories and move people.

Our approach combines creative direction, visual strategy, and content production to bring bold ideas to life across digital and print platforms. We align vision, audience, and execution to deliver campaigns that make a real impact.

accordions.title: Creative Direction & Concepting
accordions.content: Every campaign begins with a strong idea. We define the message, build a visual language around it, and ensure your brand story shines through.

accordions.title: Content Production
accordions.content: From short-form video ads to striking photography and graphics, we handle full campaign production, shooting, editing, designing, and delivering content ready to launch.

accordions.title: Social Media Campaigns
accordions.content: We design branded series, storytelling arcs, and product pushes tailored for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, and Facebook, optimized for consistency and engagement.

accordions.title: Print, Posters & OOH
accordions.content: We translate your story to the physical world: posters, event kits, billboards, brochures. The goal is simple, stop people mid-scroll or mid-walk.

accordions.title: Campaign Strategy & Management
accordions.content: Beyond content, we can manage rollouts end-to-end, from scheduling and channel planning to feedback tracking. Perfect for launches or long-term campaigns.

services.title:
Digital Experiences
(Web & Media)
services.description: We design digital experiences that don't just look good — they work. From clean portfolios to full-featured business sites, we create fast, responsive, and intuitive platforms that bring your brand to life online. Paired with photography, video, and content, your digital presence stays memorable and functional.
serviceList: Media add-ons: photography, reels, video integration
services.bannerSubtitle: Creating fast, responsive, and intuitive digital platforms that bring your brand to life online.

approach.title: Our Approach and Work Specifics
description: At InPlace Creates, we don't just build websites, we design digital experiences that work.

We combine clean aesthetics with functional thinking. From usability and performance to SEO and storytelling, every site and media piece is crafted to serve your goals, connect with audiences, and grow your brand.

includes.title: What We Deliver
items: Media add-ons: photography, reels, video integration

accordions.title: UX Audits & Strategy
accordions.content: We review your current site (or idea) through a user-first lens. We identify pain points and drop-offs, then suggest fixes to boost usability and conversions.

accordions.title: Design Thinking & UI Systems
accordions.content: Every layout, button, and flow is intentional. Paired with typography and color systems, your site becomes both beautiful and intuitive.

accordions.title: Wireframing & Prototyping
accordions.content: We blueprint your site before coding, ensuring structure and flow align with your vision and audience needs.

accordions.title: Performance & SEO Optimization
accordions.content: We make websites fast, responsive, and visible, from mobile design and load times to metadata and search optimization.

accordions.title: Media Production Add-On
accordions.content: Need more than the site? We create photography, video reels, and visual assets designed to seamlessly integrate into your digital presence.

accordions.title: Web Management & Support
accordions.content: We provide monthly support, content updates, or CMS training, helping your site evolve as your brand grows.

services.title:
Creative Systems
& Strategy
services.description: Creativity scales when structure supports it. Beyond design, we build the systems that keep your brand organized, efficient, and future-ready. From Google Workspace setups to workflow automation, we bring clarity to the chaos of creativity.
serviceList: Organizational systems (shared drives, file structures, naming conventions)
Workflow automation & dashboards (Sheets, Notion, custom trackers)
Creative operations consulting (content pipelines, campaign workflows)
Capacity building & team training on creative tools
services.bannerSubtitle: Building the systems that keep your brand organized, efficient, and future-ready.

approach.title: Our Approach and Work Specifics
description: At InPlace Creates, we believe creativity scales best when paired with structure. That's why we don't just design visuals, we design the systems behind them.

Our systems approach helps brands and organizations manage their creative processes, data, and workflows with clarity and efficiency. From startups to nonprofits, we bring order to the chaos of creativity.

includes.title: Our Systems Support Includes
items: Organizational systems (shared drives, file structures, naming conventions)
Workflow automation & dashboards (Sheets, Notion, custom trackers)
Creative operations consulting (content pipelines, campaign workflows)
Capacity building & team training on creative tools
Audits & strategy for scaling your creative systems

accordions.title: Organizational Systems
accordions.content: We design Google Workspace and shared drive structures, naming conventions, and filing systems that keep your documents and data accessible and organized.

accordions.title: Workflow Automation & Dashboards
accordions.content: From Sheets formulas to Notion trackers, we build tools that simplify reporting, project management, and performance monitoring.

accordions.title: Creative Ops Consulting
accordions.content: We help teams design pipelines for content, campaigns, and media, ensuring smooth collaboration from idea to delivery.

accordions.title: Capacity Building & Training
accordions.content: We run tailored workshops for staff and teams on how to use digital tools, manage assets, and maintain creative systems long-term.

accordions.title: Audits & Systems Strategy
accordions.content: Already have a system? We review and refine, identifying inefficiencies, gaps, and opportunities to make your operations more scalable.

team.name: Kelvin
team.specialties: Branding & Identity Design | Digital Experiences | Systems Strategy
team.bio: Kelvin sits at the intersection of creativity and structure. He shapes vision, builds brands, and designs campaigns that resonate while also engineering the systems that make them sustainable. From identity design to digital products, from storytelling arcs to organizational workflows, he ensures every project carries both imagination and intention.

team.name: Tracy
team.bio: The link between vision and delivery. Tracy manages day-to-day production, project timelines, and cross-team coordination. From briefs to final rollout, she ensures creative workflows are seamless, strategic, and always on schedule.

team.name: Mercy
team.bio: Mercy is the pulse behind our productions, transforming concepts into crafted executions. She blends intuition with structure, guiding teams and refining every output. From campaigns to brand assets, she ensures work is intentional, stylish, and human.

team.name: Elvis
team.bio: Elvis builds the backbone of our digital experiences. From sleek front-ends to responsive, functional code, he ensures every website is fast, secure, and effortless to use. Quiet in presence but loud in impact, Elvis translates design into working digital magic.

team.name: Cecilia
team.bio: Cecilia turns data into direction. She designs measurement frameworks, instruments analytics, and builds clear Looker/Sheets dashboards that teams actually use. From funnel and cohort analysis to content and campaign performance, she transforms signals into simple next steps. Cecilia also sets learning agendas, runs A/B tests, and maintains clean UTM/metadata standards closing the loop between creative, web experience, and business outcomes.

reviews.review: This creative agency stands out with their exceptional talent and expertise. ... They consistently deliver visually stunning and impactful work.
They truly impressed me. They consistently think outside the box, resulting in impressive and impactful work.
Their ability to think outside the box and bring unique ideas to life is truly impressive.
They truly impressed me. I highly recommend this agency for their consistent delivery of exceptional creative solutions.

about.title: Discover Our Studio
description: At our design studio, we are a collective of talented individuals ignited by our unwavering passion for transforming ideas into reality. With a harmonious blend of diverse backgrounds and a vast array of skill sets, we join forces to create compelling solutions for our esteemed clients.

Collaboration is at the heart of what we do. Our team thrives on the synergy that arises when unique perspectives converge, fostering an environment of boundless creativity. By harnessing our collective expertise, we produce extraordinary results that consistently surpass expectations.
about.quote: Passionately Creating Design Wonders: Unleashing Boundless Creativity

services.subtitle: Comprehensive creative solutions to help your business grow and succeed in today's competitive market.

team.description: We're a tight crew of creatives, designers, programmers and producers — built to deliver on vision and execution across branding, content, web, and consulting. Each of us brings sharp skill and deep care to every project.

form.privacyNotice: * We promise not to disclose your personal information to third parties.

content.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
content.text: At InPlace Creates, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner.

content.title: Information We Collect
content.text: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details when you interact with our website or services.

content.title: How We Use Your Information
content.text: We use the information we collect to provide our services, communicate with you about projects, and improve our website and offerings.

content.title: Information Sharing
content.text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as described in this privacy policy.

content.title: Contact Us
content.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@inplacecreates.com.

reviews.title: Customer Voices: Hear What They Say!
reviews.subtitle: Customer reviews are a valuable source of information for both businesses and consumers.

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join our team of creative minds and help us build the future of design and digital experiences.

banner.title: Create Boldly. Life at InPlace.
banner.description: We're always on the lookout for curious, driven minds to join us.

intro.description: At InPlace Creates, we believe good design can shift culture, change conversations, and shape the future. We're a creative studio building brands, experiences, systems, and stories. We're always on the lookout for curious, driven minds to join us.

whatWeLookFor.title: What We Look For
whatWeLookFor.description: We collaborate with designers, developers, writers, editors, filmmakers, and strategic thinkers who are:
qualities: Passionate about storytelling, design, and systems
Comfortable working remotely or in hybrid setups
Eager to learn and push creative boundaries
Able to collaborate with clients, teams, and communities
whatWeLookFor.note: Whether you're just starting out or you've been in the game for years, if your heart's in it, we'd love to hear from you.

openRoles.title: Open Roles
openRoles.description: We regularly onboard freelance and project-based creatives across our four pillars:

noVacancy.title: No Vacancy? No Problem.
noVacancy.description: If you're interested in working with us, even if a specific role isn't listed, introduce yourself anyway. Great talent doesn't always wait for a vacancy.

application.title: Ready to Join Us?
application.description: We'd love to hear from you. Tell us about your work, your passion, and what you'd bring to our team.
